Question
========

A person achieves a score of 9.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 9 with a standard deviation 1.2. The z-score of the person with 9.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.02
* 0.29
* 0.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.02: Incorrect
* 0.29: Incorrect
* 0.5: Correct
